name: 1425 Marketing Digital Local
tagline: Web design - Social Media - Content Marketing
description:
1425 is a small digital marketing agency from Buenos Aires, Argentina.
We manage clients in English, French and Spanish and we treat each customers as if they were the only one we had.
We are a creative, fast workers and we understand your identity.
We do remote work all the time, and our prices are lower than any american or european agency. Contact us!
